It is indeed, especially when it comes to script. Mike's list is mentioned as a valuable resource in our [FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20121028133658/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq).

Good luck setting Scriptina -- I had to use it recently and the spacing and kerning is an unholy mess. :^/
A word of caution on Scriptina: You can get away with using it for short words with no character repeats, but when a t or h repeats it looks really bad.
